title: What Makes A Perfect Burrito?
description:
A flour tortilla wrapped cylindrically around a myriad of different ingredients, a burrito is so much more than the sum of its parts. This is our love letter to perhaps the greatest food delivery system ever devised by human hands.
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
  
 Learn more about your ad choices. Visit https://podcastchoices.com/adchoices
